job_description:
• Bachelor’s degree in Engineering (Electrical, Mechanical, Chemical, or related field) or equivalent experience.
• 3+ years of process engineering experience, specifically in photolithography.
• Experience with robotic process automation (RPA), and Python.
• Hands-on experience with TEL and ASML equipment a plus.
• 3+ years of experience in semiconductor manufacturing.
• Experience with SPC and data analysis tools.
• Less than 2 years Senior/Principal Engineer, Process Integration, NTI NANDSingapore, SingaporePosted a month ago Advanced Modeling Principal EngineerBoise, Idaho, United States of AmericaPosted 3 months ago Senior/Engineer, Metrology Process DevelopmentSingapore, SingaporePosted 2 months ago.

• Experience with a cloud environment and services (e.
• A background in biology is not required, but curiosity and scientific interest is.
• Bachelor's degree in computer science, engineering, math, or scientific discipline and 2 years of software development OR 4 years of professional experience building software.
• Experience developing web applications in React and Redux.
• Experience with shipping and maintaining software.
• Strong understanding of computer science fundamentals (e.
• Data structures, space and time complexity) Deep understanding of testing, build, continuous integration, deployment & continuous monitoring.
• AWS) Willingness to solve problems irrespective of where it is in the tech stack.
